bugReportExample.title: Space character in img src URL of the 'CFD vs Aktien' image of [CFD vs share trading] sidebar item

stepsToReproduce.step: 3. Hover on menu section [Schulung] (EN: Education)</step 4. Click menu item [CFD-Handel] (EN: CFD trading) 5. Click sidebar item [Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Aktien und CFD?] (EN: CFDs vs share trading) 6. Open devtools and look at the img src href

bugReportExample.expectedResult: img src URL has no spaces so the image is displayed on the webpage
bugReportExample.actualResult: img src URL has a space so the image is not displayed on the webpage
bugReportExample.author: ida-que
